item.Q:
Write the character:
letter; symbol; character; word
item.A:
zì
数字 (數字) shùzì numeral; digit; number; figure; amount; digital (electronics etc)

item.Q:
Write the character:
a division (military); teacher; master; expert; model
item.A:
师 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 師
shī
教师 (教師) jiàoshī teacher

item.Q:
Write the character:
and; furthermore; (not) at all; simultaneously; also; together with; to combine; to join; to merge
item.A:
traditional: 並
bìng
并且 (並且) bìngqiě and; besides; moreover; furthermore; in addition

zhèng
政府 zhèngfǔ government

item.Q:
Write the character:
curios; antiques; to play; to amuse oneself; to have fun
item.A:
wán
玩弄 wánnòng resort to; engage in; play with

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname; to open up; to spread; sheet of paper; classifier for flat objects, sheet
item.A:
traditional: 張
zhāng
主张 (主張) zhǔzhāng to advocate; to stand for; view; position; stand; proposition; viewpoint; assertion

nán
男子 nánzǐ a man; a male

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: who
2: who (variant pronunciation); surname
item.A:
traditional: 誰
1: shéi 2: shuí

shān
孙中山 (孫中山) SūnZhōngshān Dr Sun Yat-sen (1866-1925), first president of the Republic of China and co-founder of the Kuomintang; same as 孫逸仙|孙逸仙

item.Q:
Write the character:
every; each (with an emphasis on the common characteristic of individuals)
item.A:
měi
每个 (每個) měige each

item.Q:
Write the character:
knot; sturdy; to bear (fruit); bond; to tie; to bind; to check out (of a hotel)
item.A:
traditional: 結
jié
结果 (結果) jiéguǒ outcome; result; conclusion; to kill; to dispatch

qiě
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character:
star; satellite; small amount
item.A:
xīng
星期 xīngqī week

item.Q:
Write the character:
non-; not-; un-; abbr. for Africa; wrong; evil-doing; insist on; simply must
item.A:
fēi
非常 fēicháng unusual; extraordinary; extreme; very; exceptional

item.Q:
Write the character:
to establish; to found; to set up; to build; to construct
item.A:
jiàn
建设 (建設) jiànshè to build; to construct; construction; constructive

item.Q:
Write the character:
to change; to alter; to transform; to correct
item.A:
gǎi
改变 (改變) gǎibiàn to change; to alter; to transform

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname; even; as; join; to link; successively
item.A:
连 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 連
lián
连续 (連續) liánxù continuous; in a row

item.Q:
Write the character:
to release; to free; to let go; to put; to place; to let out
item.A:
fàng
解放 jiěfàng to liberate; to emancipate; liberation

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: laughter; yawn; abbr. for Kazakhstan
2: a Pekinese; a pug
item.A:
1: hā 2: hǎ
哈哈 hāhā (an onomatopoeia for laughing) 哈吉 hǎjí hadji (one who has made the pilgrimage to Mecca)

érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore
shēnghuó life; activity; to live

traditional: 活動
huódòng activity; exercise; behavior

traditional: 並且
bìngqiě and; besides; moreover; furthermore; in addition

traditional: 結果
jiéguǒ outcome; result; conclusion; to kill; to dispatch
jiēguǒ to bear fruit
jiànlì creation; set up; construction; build; establish; set up

traditional: 結合
jiéhé to combine; to link; to integrate; binding
jiěfàng to liberate; to emancipate; liberation

traditional: 並不
bìngbù not at all; emphatically not
fēicháng unusual; extraordinary; extreme; very; exceptional

traditional: 主張
zhǔzhāng to advocate; to stand for; view; position; stand; proposition; viewpoint; assertion

traditional: 每個
měige each

traditional: 為主
wéizhǔ as important
chángcháng frequently; usually; often

traditional: 相對
xiāngduì relatively; opposite; to resist; to oppose; relative; vis-a-vis

traditional: 接著
jiēzhe continue; went on to (do something); to follow; to carry on; then; after that

traditional: 各種
gèzhǒng every kind of; all kinds of; various kinds

traditional: 書記
shūji secretary; clerk

traditional: 發出
fāchū to send out; to dispatch; to issue
fēnjiě resolve; decompose; break down
